verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: When the blind man approached him.
verse.verse_3: But how do you know? Perhaps he was seeking to purify himself.
verse.verse_4: Or be reminded, and the message would benefit him.
verse.verse_5: But as for him who was indifferent.
verse.verse_7: Though you are not liable if he does not purify himself.
verse.verse_8: But as for him who came to you seeking.
verse.verse_11: Do not. This is a Lesson.
verse.verse_17: Perish man! How thankless he is!
verse.verse_18: From what did He create him?
verse.verse_19: From a sperm drop He created him, and enabled him.
verse.verse_20: Then He eased the way for him.
verse.verse_21: Then He puts him to death, and buries him.
verse.verse_22: Then, when He wills, He will resurrect him.
verse.verse_23: But no, he did not fulfill what He has commanded him.
verse.verse_25: We pour down water in abundance.
verse.verse_32: Enjoyment for you, and for your livestock.
verse.verse_33: But when the Deafening Noise comes to pass.
verse.verse_34: The Day when a person will flee from his brother.
verse.verse_35: And his mother and his father.
verse.verse_36: And his consort and his children.
verse.verse_37: Every one of them, on that Day, will have enough to preoccupy him.
verse.verse_38: Faces on that Day will be radiant.
verse.verse_40: And Faces on that Day will be covered with misery.
verse.verse_42: These are the faithless, the vicious.
